## Mission

Create custom report builder with drag-and-drop interface.

## Branch

`claude/wave4/report-builder`

## Scope

- Report template system
- Drag-and-drop builder
- Data source selection
- Export formats

## Features

1. Visual report builder
2. Saved report templates
3. Scheduled reports
4. Multiple export formats

## Output

`docs/WAVE4_REPORT_BUILDER_COMPLETE.md`
